text.cabinfever.guide.death_expends_coal: Getting killed expends your coal faster.
text.cabinfever.guide.dont_run_out_of_co: Don't let your coal meter reach zero!
text.cabinfever.guide.mine_coal: Mine coal from the piles outside!
text.cabinfever.guide.place_coal_in_camp: Place your mined coal in the campfire.
